item.title: Get string out of a tensor string
item.description: How to pass arguments to a map function import tensorflow as tf tf.constant('hello') <tf.Tensor: shape=(), dtype=string, numpy=b'hello'> tf.constant('hello').numpy() b'hello' tf.constant('hello').numpy().decode('utf-8') 'hello'

item.title: Pass arguments to TF map using lambda
item.description: How to pass arguments to a map function import tensorflow as tf def fun(x, arg): return x * arg my_arg = tf.constant(2, dtype=tf.int64) ds = tf.data.Dataset.range(5) ds = ds.map(lambda x: fun(x, my_arg))
